articles.title: Doctor who helped sound alarm on coronavirus dies
articles.description: One of the first Chinese doctors who tried to warn the world about a new coronavirus died on Friday from the illness, as China's Hubei province reported 69 new deaths, taking the total in China to over 600. Adam Reed reports.
articles.content:
Posted 
One of the first Chinese doctors who tried to warn the world about a new coronavirus died on Friday from the illness, as China's Hubei province reported 69 new deaths, taking the total in China to over 600. Adam Reed reports.
